DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate preliminary safety efficacy PDS 1.0 patient neovascular AMD .
DOC.brief_title: Preliminary Safety Efficacy PDS-1.0 Patients With Neovascular Age Related Macular Degeneration ( AMD )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis CNV secondary AMD confirm fluorescein angiography , previously treat Retinal thickness due edema least 300um study eye Best correct visual acuity 20/40 worse study eye Best correct visual acuity 20/40 good fellow eye Evidence scar CNV ( e.g . geographic atrophy ) study eye Fibrosis > 75 % lesion area study eye
